short_summary: Request for Proposal for procuring Overwrap Bags & Beverage Bags
description: This request involves the procurement of overwrap bags and beverage bags used for individual meal pouches used as combat rations. The Canadian Department of National Defence is seeking proposals to source these items.

### Tender Description:
This solicitation seeks to award a contract for the production and delivery of overwrap bags and beverage bags as part of the National Combat Ration Program.

Each year, individual meal pouches are produced by the National Combat Ration Program for training exercises, deployed operations or emergency situations. The pouches consist of various food and non-food items packaged in an overwrap bag.

The intent of this solicitation is to award one contract for the requirements listed in Annex A, Statement of Requirement. The successful bidder will be responsible for ensuring sufficient product is available to sustain the first assembly period and maintain the assembly line.
